channel.title: Nether Spawn
channel.description:
is it possible to remove nether spawn or something because me and my friend are trying to make a minecart track and the nether spawn is stopping us from making part of it.
dont even say make it in realworld because im 7k blocks from spawn

item.title: Nether Spawn
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Actually it never occurred to me to protect it with a residence, I believe I can probably add one manually 100x100 that won’t expire in the config file. I’ll look into it soonish.

oh sweet

Read full topic

item.title: Nether Spawn
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:19, topic:406536”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=503536.msg3684085#msg3684085 date=1311733350]

Or you could build around it. that works too.

too much iron to waste

Obviously haven’t had a problem with it til now. So, stop being lazy and build around it.

Or you could build around it. that works too.
[/quote]thats like 100 more rails which is 1000 more iron and 500 sticks…

What I said above.

which also means 500 gold and 250 sticks and 100 redstone ; for the powered tracks and digging through the netherrack… so perhaps diamond and iron wasted aswell

Like I said, you haven’t had a problem with it until now, so I’ll just say it again. Work like you’ve been working.

As far as I know, at least the way its currently protected now it can’t be done.

Because your request most likely will not happen.

lol you just want me to waste precious materials and double the time the ride takes when we can just remove something that annoys almost everyone

I only see two people annoyed with it. You and mironic. Honestly, that’s not EVERYONE on the server.

then lets hold a poll shall we?[/quote]

That’s how anything gets done within the community.

Read full topic

what im saying is he can give him self 1 more protection to protect spawn… and make the server ALOT better…
